info.name: REST API Project
info.description:
This project validates the Restful-Booker API, a hotel booking service supporting CRUD operations, authentication, and multiple data formats (JSON, XML, URL-encoded).

It includes positive, negative, and boundary testing along with error handling and verifies unique behaviors like the 10-minute auto-reset.

Manual (Postman) approach is applied to ensure functional reliability.

request.description:
Creates a new auth token to use for access to the PUT and DELETE /booking

Generated from cURL: curl -X POST  
[https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth)  
\-H 'Content-Type: application/json'  
\-d '{  
"username" : "admin",  
"password" : "password123"  
}'

Returns a specific booking based upon the booking id provided

Generated from cURL: curl -i [https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1)

Creates a new booking in the API

Generated from cURL: curl -X POST  
[https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking)  
\-H 'Content-Type: application/json'  
\-d '{  
"firstname" : "Jim",  
"lastname" : "Brown",  
"totalprice" : 111,  
"depositpaid" : true,  
"bookingdates" : {  
"checkin" : "2018-01-01",  
"checkout" : "2019-01-01"  
},  
"additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"  
}'

Updates a current booking

Generated from cURL: curl -X PUT  
[https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1)  
\-H 'Content-Type: application/json'  
\-H 'Accept: application/json'  
\-H 'Cookie: token=abc123'  
\-d '{  
"firstname" : "James",  
"lastname" : "Brown",  
"totalprice" : 111,  
"depositpaid" : true,  
"bookingdates" : {  
"checkin" : "2018-01-01",  
"checkout" : "2019-01-01"  
},  
"additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"  
}'

Updates a current booking with a partial payload  
Generated from cURL: curl -X PUT  
[https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1)  
\-H 'Content-Type: application/json'  
\-H 'Accept: application/json'  
\-H 'Cookie: token=abc123'  
\-d '{  
"firstname" : "James",  
"lastname" : "Brown"  
}'

Deletes a booking from the API. Requires an authorization token to be set in the header or a Basic auth header.

Generated from cURL: curl -X DELETE  
[https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1)  
\-H 'Content-Type: application/json'  
\-H 'Cookie: token=abc123'

A simple health check endpoint to confirm whether the API is up and running.

Generated from cURL: curl -i [https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/ping](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/ping)
